faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Spaced repetition is a scientifically proven learning method that schedules reviews at optimal intervals to maximize long-term memory retention. ReeeeecallStudy uses an advanced SRS algorithm to automatically determine when you should review each flashcard.
faq.a2: Yes! ReeeeecallStudy is free to use. Sign up with email and password to start learning immediately with all core features including SRS, multiple study modes, and detailed statistics.
faq.a3: ReeeeecallStudy supports 5 study modes: SRS (spaced repetition) for optimal review scheduling, Random for mixed practice, Sequential for ordered review, Sequential Review for systematic revision, and By Date for time-based organization.
faq.q4: Can I share my flashcard decks?
faq.a4: Yes! You can share decks in 3 modes: Copy (duplicate for others), Subscribe (sync updates), and Snapshot (frozen version). Browse and discover other users' decks in the community marketplace.
